original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevantassa āpattiyaḥ catunnam vipattīnam kati vipattiyaḥ bhajanti

original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevantassa āpattiyaḥ catunnam vipattīnam dve vipattiyaḥ bhajanti
siyā sīla vipatti siyā ācāra vipattim pe

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karontassa āpatti catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajati?
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karontassa āpatti catunnam vipattīnam kati vipattiyaḥ bhajati

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karontassa āpatti catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ ekaṁ vipattiṁ bhajati—
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karontassa āpatti catunnam vipattīnam ekam vipattim bhajati
